question: Several features of the Constitution of India have been borrowed from different sources. Which of the following is not a correct match in this context?
option1: Government of India Act, 1935 - Federal Scheme
option4: Japanese Constitution - Procedure established by Law
explanation: Jawaharlal Nehru was the Vice President of the Executive Council, External Affairs and Commonwealth Relations in the first as well as second Interim Cabinet. The president was Lord Wavell - Viceroy and Governor-General of India.
